prediction.This is the same policy that all those e:
The sentence is an example of an ad populum fallacy, as it attempts to appeal to the popularity or majority support of a certain group (in this case, "extreme feminist groups") to make the conclusion more persuasive. However, the truth or validity of the argument should not depend on the popularity or number of people who agree with the conclusion.
    
    Explanation:
    
    The sentence "This is the same policy that all those extreme feminist groups support" attempts to use the appeal to majority or ad populum fallacy, which occurs when an argument tries to persuade the audience by appealing to the popularity or the fact that many people believe in a certain idea. In this case, the speaker implies that because Delores supports equal pay for equal work and "all those extreme feminist groups" also support it, then the policy must be good and reasonable.
